meanings.definition: The act of writing or inserting between lines.
meanings.sent1: Her interlineation of notes in the book made it easier to study.
meanings.sent2: The editor suggested an interlineation to clarify the paragraph.
meanings.sent3: The interlineation of jokes in the speech added a touch of humor.
meanings.sent4: His interlineation of ideas brought a new perspective to the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The interlineation of colorful illustrations made the textbook more engaging.

meanings.definition: A line inserted between other lines.
meanings.sent1: The interlineation in the document highlighted the important points.
meanings.sent2: She added an interlineation to separate the sections of the report.
meanings.sent3: The interlineation of a secret message caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The interlineation of a border enhanced the design of the invitation.
meanings.sent5: His interlineation of a quote emphasized its significance.
